sense.def:
To dab a substance onto a surface
pomeni nanesti snov na površino nečesa s hitrimi, nežnimi gibi.
To dab a surface with something
pomeni hitro in nežno namazati površino s tisto snovjo.

seg.quote: She dabbed some powder on her nose.
He dabbed the cuts with disinfectant.

sense.def:
A dab of something
je majhna količina nečesa, kar položimo na površino.

seg.quote: She returned wearing a dab of rouge on each cheekbone.

sense.def:
To be a dab hand at something
pomeni biti dober pri nekem delu;
